name: Seconds to Square (itch)
description:
Goal

Reach the end of the level as fast as you can before you run out of time! Draw speed and slow boxes with a mouse to manipulate your momentum and environment around you.

Speed boxes allow you to run faster and jump higher while slow boxes make you invulnerable to projectiles.

Controls (Customizable in Main Menu)
  • A/D - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • C - Clear Boxes
  • R - Quick Respawn
  • Left Click - Speed Box
  • Right Click - Slow Box
  • P/Escape - Pause
